title: From Haiti to Trinidad
brief_description: A short travelogue containing documentary footage of various Caribbean Islands - Haiti, Barbados, Martinique, Puerto Rico, Trinidad. Includes shots of labourers interspersed with urban footage, topped off with a dash of sunny beaches. No commentary - English intertitles.
